EmailTemplate.name: Drip - Series 1 - Feb 2015.Email 6 - Download Trial CTA
EmailTemplate.subject: Download a Trial of Tosca Testsuite Today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
I know that things that sound too good to be true usually are too good to be true - but don’t take our word for it, find out for yourself if Tricentis’ Tosca Testsuite lives up to the hype.
Download our free trial <http://innovate.tricentis.com/trial-request.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=drp> of Tosca Testsuite and Udemy Tosca 101 course <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/get-in-touch-with-tricentis-tosca-testsuite> and begin optimizing, managing, and automating your testing today. Because everyone should be able to test better - not harder!
If you have any questions about Tricentis or our Tosca Testsuite, please don’t hesitate to reach out!
Best regards,
Vincent
Vincent Ruth Western Region Territory Director Tricentis
m - +1.408.568.9698 e - v.ruth@tricentis.com <mailto:v.ruth@tricentis.com>
